__e: More exhibitors, more visitors, more internationality: with 988 exhibitors from 31 countries and 18,094 visitors from 74 countries, the event grew at a healthy clip again.

With more than 1235 exhibitors from 52 countries and 40.200 trade visitors from more than 100 countries the 2018 edition of GLASSTEC which takes place from the 23rd till the 26th of October , is a worldwide reference in the glass industry.
The program conditions for the event exhibitors are the next:
More than 1000 exhibitors and 4000 animals will be present for all this week of show.
Thank you to our sponsors, exhibitors and attendees for all your support. Photos of the event will be posted on our website in a few weeks.
Exhibitors and visitors may connect before, during and after the event.
We thank all visitors and exhibitors who have contributed to this success!
All exhibitors who leave their dogs longer than 5 minutes unattended in the car, will be excluded from all further dogshows in Switzerland
